items.content_html: react-scribble is a lightweight, dependency free React component built for capturing handwritten signatures. It provides a simple and responsive signature pad, perfect for e-signatures, form authentication, or user confirmations in React applications
items.title: tim-rayner/react-esign: react-scribble is a lightweight, dependency free React component built for capturing handwritten signatures. It provides a simple and responsive signature pad, perfect for e-signatures, form authentication, or user confirmations in React applications

items.content_html: An AI-powered translation npm package for i18n JSON files. This package helps you automatically translate your internationalization files using AI language models while handling large files through intelligent chunking. Lightweight and fast.
items.title: dalisys/i18n-ai: An AI-powered translation npm package for i18n JSON files. This package helps you automatically translate your internationalization files using AI language models while handling large files through intelligent chunking. Lightweight and fast.

items.content_html: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.

items.content_html: The xxAPI repository is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify common DOM manipulation tasks, handle AJAX requests, manage cookies and local storage, and provide utilities for smooth scrolling, function throttling, script loading, URL manipulation, and random data generation.
items.title: N3M1K/xxapi:  The xxAPI repository is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify common DOM manipulation tasks, handle AJAX requests, manage cookies and local storage, and provide utilities for smooth scrolling, function throttling, script loading, URL manipulation, and random data generation.

items.content_html: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory.
items.title: zacheryvaughn/network-volume-manager: A lightweight File Manager that I am building specifically for RunPod "Network Volumes", but it can be used in any environment where volumes are mounted to the root directory.

items.content_html: wysimark ( https://github.com/portive/wysimark ) is a modern and clean rich text editor for React, supporting CommonMark and GFM Markdown spec. It is a fork of wysimark with some modifications to make it more lightweight and easier to use.
